entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
